qrscreen.qrscantext: Scan QR Code to register your mobile phone and start your verification with ImproveID to get your modern passwordless identity credentials.
qrscreen.alignText: Align the QR code within the frame to scan.
qrscreen.continuetext: By continuing, you are agreeing to our

validationscreen.selectionText: Select the type of document you would like to use to verify you
validationscreen.makesureText: Make sure document text is legible and images are glare-free

uploadscreen.subtitle: Take a photo of the page with your headshot picture
uploadscreen.subtitledoc: Take a photo of the front of your identity card
uploadscreen.subtitleback: Take a photo of the back of your identity card
uploadscreen.subtitlecertificate: Take a photo of the front of your birth certificate
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction: Place part of your passport page in the frame.
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction1: Position the front of your license in the frame
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction2: Position the back of your license in the frame
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction3: Position the front of your certificate in the frame

readscreen.title: Check Readablity
readscreen.subtitle: Make sure document text is legible and images are glare-free
readscreen.subtitledoc: Make sure your license details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
readscreen.subtitlecertificate: Make sure your certificate details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

selfiescreen.title: Take a Selfie
selfiescreen.subtitle: We'll compare the photo in your passport with your selfie
selfiescreen.instruction2: Wearing glasses? Make sure we can clearly see your eyes

consentsign.title: Consent and Sign
consentsign.subtitle: To complete your verification we require you to accept our terms & conditions and agree to our process of your information.
consentsign.instruction1: By clicking Next, I accept the Terms and Conditions
consentsign.instruction2: I agree to the processing of my personal data, as described in the Consent to Personal Data Processing

submitverification.title: Great, that's everything we need
submitverification.subtitle: We're now ready to verify your identity

popupmessage.successmessage: Congratulations, you have successfully completed device registration and credential issuance. Please provide your feedback and rating to help us serve you better. Thanks!
popupmessage.waitingmsg: Thanks for submitting your information. Your application requires approval. Once it is approved you will be notified with email and sms. If your application is not approved you will also be notified with a rejection reason.
popupmessage.deletemsg: Are you sure you want to Suspend your identity? You cannot use your identity after Suspending them. However, if permitted, you can reissue them.
